CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( IF( AND(NOT(ISNULL(Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Commit_Base_URL__c)), Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Commit_Base_URL__c != ''), IF( AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Git_Provider__c,'')),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Git_Provider__c, 'Others'))), Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Commit_Base_URL__c + Snapshot_Commit__r.Commit_Id__c, IF( CONTAINS(Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Commit_Base_URL__c,'[COMMIT_ID]'), SUBSTITUTE(Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Commit_Base_URL__c,'[COMMIT_ID]',Snapshot_Commit__r.Commit_Id__c), Snapshot_Commit__r.Git_Backup__r.Git_Repository__r.Commit_Base_URL__c + Snapshot_Commit__r.Commit_Id__c ) ), ''), Snapshot_Commit__r.Commit_Id__c )
CustomField.label: View in Git
